lead_paragraph: Three former officials of Kenya's disbanded Olympic committee were charged on Wednesday with theft and fraud offences relating to this year's Games in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: Former Kenyan Officials Charged With Theft, Fraud
headline.main: Former Kenyan Officials Charged With Theft, Fraud
